claw2ez.data.html clawcode2html   
 Source file:   claw2ez.data
 Directory:   /Users/ketch/Dropbox/SharpClaw/2d/examples/advection/swirl
 Converted:   Mon Jun 21 2010 at 00:56:18
 This documentation file will not reflect any later changes in the source file. 

 
 1000                mx          = cells in x direction
 1000                my          = cells in y direction

16                 nout        = number of output times to print results
1                  outstyle    = style of specifying output times
4.00d0             tfinal      = final time

0.009d0            dtv(1)      = initial dt (used in all steps if method(1)=0)
1.0d99             dtv(2)      = max allowable dt
0.5d0              cflv(1)     = max allowable Courant number
0.45d0              cflv(2)     = desired Courant number
500                nv(1)       = max number of time steps per call to claw2

1                  method(1)   = 1 for variable dt,   = 0 for fixed dt
1                  method(2)   = time stepping scheme
1                  method(3)   = 0 for dim-by-dim, 1 for GMD
1                  method(4)   = verbosity of output
0                  method(5)   = source term splitting
0                  method(6)   = mcapa
2                  method(7)   = maux (should agree with parameter in driver)
0                  method(8)   = 
0                  method(9)   = level of characteristic decomposition

1                  meqn        = number of equations in hyperbolic system
1                  mwaves      = number of waves in each Riemann solution
5                  mthlim(mw)  = limiter for each wave  (mw=1,mwaves)

0.d0               t0          = initial time
0.0d0              xlower      = left edge of computational domain
1.0d0              xupper      = right edge of computational domain
0.0d0              ylower      = bottom edge of computational domain
1.0d0              yupper      = top edge of computational domain

3                  mbc         = number of ghost cells at each boundary
1                  mthbc(1)    = type of boundary conditions at left
1                  mthbc(2)    = type of boundary conditions at right
1                  mthbc(3)    = type of boundary conditions at bottom
1                  mthbc(4)    = type of boundary conditions at top
